Html:
Hey guys! I am currently working on a game using DirectX and FW1 for font rendering. For some reason, on some computers all whitespace characters are showing up as boxes.

Here is what it should look like:


Here is what it looks like with the error:


Note "Play Game" and "How To Play" have odd blocks in them. It seems to still show the right kerning for spaces, so I am a little confused.

Any help would be MUCH appreciated!

Edit: It turns out this only happens with spaces. When I replace all of my spaces with "\t", it seems to work as intended. Any help would still be greatly appreciated!
